channel.title: Portfolio v2 blog
channel.description: Full-stack systems engineer crafting star-bright experiences.

item.title: Star-simulator runtimes without burnout
item.description: Breaking down how I tuned a constellation visualizer to stream telemetry at 120fps without shipping any fragile JS frameworks.

item.title: Skill trees as engineering protocols
item.description: Documenting my approach to mapping strengths like a video game tree so stakeholders instantly see balance across strategy, craft, and leadership.

item.title: Why Astro still wins for content-heavy apps
item.description: A teardown of a commerce site where Astro gave us lighthouse 100s while keeping authoring workflows friendly for non-engineers.
